text: Herbie Goes to Monte Carlo is a 1977 American sports adventure comedy movie directed by Vincent McEveety and written by Arthur Alsberg and Don Nelson. It stars Dean Jones, Don Knotts, Julie Sommars, Jacques Marin, Roy Kinnear and Bernard Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1970s sports movies Category:1977 adventure movies Category:1977 romantic comedy movies Category:Herbie movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Disney movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1970s American adventure movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies about automobiles Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in Monaco Category:American sports comedy movies
title: Herbie Goes to Monte Carlo
